name: Music_4020.wav
keywords: ['electric guitar', 'instructional clip', 'male voice', 'pentatonic scale descending run', 'double stop', 'string bending']
caption: This audio clip features an instruction of playing the guitar. An electric guitar plays a descending pentatonic run at two different places on the guitar to give a different feel. The voice narrates the process of playing the notes. This is followed by a double stop which is played seven times with a string bend on the eighth time. This can be used in an instruction video.
